front.title: An efficient method to publish ranges of IP addresses in the DNS

abstract.t: The DNS has long been used to publish lists of IPv4 address ranges in blacklists and whitelists. The size of the IPv6 address space makes the entry-per-IP approach used for IPv4 lists impractical. A new technique for publishing IP address ranges is described. It is intended to permit efficient publishing and querying, and to have good DNS cache behavior.
